titles.title: 401Kids Family Savings Act of 2013
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve and expand education savings accounts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/18/2013--Introduced. 401Kids Family Savings Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) rename Coverdell education savings accounts as 401Kids savings accounts, (2) allow the use of such accounts to pay the acquisition costs of a first-time homebuyer, and (3) allow tax-free rollovers of amounts in a 401Kids savings account to a Roth individual retirement account (Roth IRA).
